item.title: CVE-2023-50885|2024-04-18T11:00:43.203Z -- agilelogix -- store%20locator%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in AGILELOGIX Store Locator WordPress.This issue affects Store Locator WordPress: from n/a through 1.4.14.
